name: ExaVoid
description:
ExaVoid is a challenging endless space shooter where you focus on destroying as many alien ships as possible while defending your main flagship. The more enemies pass you, the less chance your flagship has at survival.

Controls:

-Arrow keys for movement

-Space to shoot

-1,2,3,4,5 to change weapons

For questions, bug reports, or feedback:
